name: Ext_R5_DiagnosticReport_subject
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.DiagnosticReport.subject for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents DiagnosticReport.subject from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DiagnosticReport|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The subject of the report - usually, but not always, the patient
element.definition: The subject of the report. Usually, but not always, this is a patient. However, diagnostic services also perform analyses on specimens collected from a variety of other sources.
element.comment: `DiagnosticReport.subject` maps to R4B `DiagnosticReport.subject`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/BiologicallyDerivedProduct)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
